welcome_message_body: Welcome to Ulaanbaatar, the charming capital city of Mongolia! Get ready to experience the rich history, vibrant culture, and breathtaking landscapes of this unique destination. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that Ulaanbaatar has to offer.

restaurants.name: Sakura Japanese Bakery
restaurants.description: Sakura Japanese Bakery is a japanese restaurant located in Улаанбаатар.

restaurants.name: Luna Blanca
restaurants.description: Luna Blanca is a vegan and vegetarian restaurant located in the city.

terminals.name: Terminal 1

terminals.name: Terminal 2
